about.summary: PDF generator using HTML and CSS

name: xhtml2pdf
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xhtml2pdf" %}
{% set version = "0.2.3" %}
{% set file_ext = "tar.gz" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "86a37e78d7a8d8bb2761746c3d559e12284d92c4d531b3a8a0f8fd632b436f82" %}

package:
  name: '{{ name|lower }}'
  version: '{{ version }}'

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win or py2k]
  entry_points:
    - pisa = xhtml2pdf.pisa:command
    - xhtml2pdf = xhtml2pdf.pisa:command
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - html5lib >=1.0
    - pillow
    - pip
    - pypdf2
    - python
    - reportlab >=3.0
    - setuptools
    - six
  run:
    - html5lib >=1.0
    - pillow
    - pypdf2
    - python
    - reportlab >=3.0
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - xhtml2pdf
    - xhtml2pdf.config
    - xhtml2pdf.w3c
  commands:
    - pisa --help
    - xhtml2pdf --help

about:
  home: http://github.com/xhtml2pdf/xhtml2pdf
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: PDF generator using HTML and CSS

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mrakitin
